DOC.brief_title: ERCP-induced Non-ERCP Induced Acute Pancreatitis : Two Distinct Clinical Immunological Entities ?
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL : All patient indication endoscopic retrograde cholangiopancreatography ( ERCP ) prepare ERCP follow protocol : instructed eat 4 6 hour procedure . Immediately procedure administrate Diclophenac Sodium 100 mg suppository . One hour procedure 10 mL blood sample urine sample take analyzed laboratory premise incorporate University Hospital Centre Rijeka follow parameter : value amylase serum urine lipase serum , liver enzyme test kidney function . 4-6 hour ERCP perform , 10 mL blood sample take analyzed laboratory premise incorporate University Hospital Centre Rijeka follow parameter : value amylase serum urine lipase serum , liver enzyme test kidney function . 24 hour procedure patient take 30 ml heparinized peripheral venous blood urine sample . 10 mL examine Department Laboratory Medicine , Clinical Hospital Centre follow parameter : value amylase serum urine lipase serum , liver enzyme test kidney function . Urine sample collect procedure use evaluate amylase level . Other 20 mL blood sample send Department Physiology Immunology , School Medicine immunologic analysis perform . All patient underwent ERCP divide two group . First group ( PEP group ) make patient developed acute pancreatitis follow ERCP . Upon clinical laboratory confirmation acute pancreatitis accord European Society Gastrointestinal Endoscopy ( ESGE ) guideline post-ERCP pancreatitis , monitor hospitalization evaluation severity disease . Severity disease assess accord Cotton criterion severity post-ERCP pancreatitis . Group patient underwent ERCP n't develop acute pancreatitis within 24 hour procedure , accord ESGE guideline use control group ( non-PEP group ) . All patient acute pancreatitis accord Atlanta criterion admit Emergency Department take 30 ml heparinized peripheral venous blood urine sample upon 24 hour clinical symptom start ( upper abdominal pain often radiate back ) . 10 mL collect blood sample examine Department Laboratory Medicine , Clinical Hospital Centre follow parameter : value amylase serum urine lipase serum , liver enzyme test kidney function . Other 20 mL blood sample send Department Physiology Immunology , School Medicine immunologic analysis perform . This group patient monitor hospitalization evaluation severity disease . Severity disease assess accord Atlanta criterion . METHODS AND MATERIALS Laboratory parameter For patient include study blood urine analysis perform Department Laboratory Medicine , Clinical Hospital Centre Rijeka . Basic hematology test include : total blood count - count total number red blood cell , white blood cell platelets present blood , value hemoglobin hematocrit . Biochemical analysis blood serum include : value amylase lipase serum , sodium , potassium , glucose , liver enzymes ( aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) , alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) , Gama-glutamyl transferase ( GGT ) , alkaline phosphatase ( ALP ) ) direct indirect bilirubin , kidney function ( serum urea creatinine , estimate glomerular filtration ( eGFR ) ) , C-reactive protein acid-base status arterial blood . Immunological method For patient include study immunologic analysis blood sample ( 24 hour procedure onset symptom ) perform Department Physiology Immunology , School Medicine Rijeka , Croatia . Isolation peripheral blood mononuclear cell Twenty milliliter peripheral blood acquire Vacutainer ( Becton Dickinson , Franklin Lakes , NY ) , overlay onto Lymphoprep ( Nycomed Pharma AS , Oslo , Norway ) centrifuge ( 20 min 600 g ) . After centrifugation , cell interface collect washed twice Roswell Park Memorial Institute ( RPMI ) 1640 medium ( Auckland , NZ ) use immediately experimental procedure . The viability cell > 95 % assessed propidium iodide 0.5 mg/ml/106 cell ( Sigma-Aldrich Chemie ) flow cytometer ( FACSCalibur , Becton Dickinson , San Jose , USA ) Detection cell surface Peripheral blood mononuclear cell ( PBMC ) stain 30 min 40 degree Celsius different combination Phycoerythrin ( PE ) - Cyanine ( Cy ) anti-cluster differentiation ( CD ) 3 monoclonal antibody ( mouse Antibody ( mAb ) , Immunoglobulin G 1 ( IgG1 ) ) , PE-conjugated anti-cluster differentiation ( CD ) 56 mAb ( mouse B159 , IgG1 ) fluorescein isothiocyanate ( FITC ) -conjugated anti-natural-killer group 2 , member D ( NKG2D ) mAb ( 5C6 ) . FITC- , PE- PE-Cy conjugate mouse isotype match antibody use set negative control class antibody use .
